```{r}
library(MASS)
library(Group9LinearModel)
data(Boston)
fit = myLm(Boston$crim, Boston[c("age", "medv")])

print.myLm(fit)

confint.myLm(fit)
confint.myLm(fit, alpha=.1)
confint.myLm(fit, alpha=.1, approach="boot")

plot.myLm(fit)
qqPlot(fit)
hist.myLm(fit)

```
